sub_title: Senior Vice President & CDO at Nemko Group | Guest Lecturer at UvA | TICC Industry Expert | Business Strategist | Digital Transformation Leader | Business & Executive Mentor | Author | Public Speaker
summary:
I have more than two decades of experience as a senior manager in the corporate world. I work as SVP Chief Digital Officer (CDO) in Nemko. In addition, as a mentor, I help entrepreneurs to establish, develop and transform businesses. I am the author of the book “Build An Online Business in 24 Hours”.

I am passionate about Business Build, Business Strategy, and Business Transformation. I do study and write about the developments in the Entrepreneurship, Business Models, Technology, and Digital Transformation.

In my career I have been covering a wide range of disciplines including Digital Transformation, Strategic Planning, Business Management, Technology Application, Processes and Systems, Marketing and Sales management, Quality, Compliance, and Engineering across multiple industries such as Certification, Testing, Management Consulting, Automotive, Feed, Packaging, and Investment Banking. I have also been involved in a very wide variety of topics and projects from Strategic to Operational and from Technology to day-to-day Business Management.

I have a BSc degree in Mechanical Engineering, an MBA, and a PhD in Management and have been following various Executive Leadership and Digital Transformation studies.

𝑴𝒀 𝑾𝑶𝑹𝑲 𝑰𝑵 𝑵𝑬𝑴𝑲𝑶
➡️ As Chief Digital Officer in Nemko Group, I work together with the rest of organization on digitalization of our business processes, and digital transformation of our business. If I or any of my colleagues can be of your assistance, please write to me at shahram.g.maralani@nemko.com. I will help you or connect you to the right person across the organization.

𝑾𝑯𝑨𝑻 𝑪𝑨𝑵 𝑰 𝑫𝑶 𝑭𝑶𝑹 𝒀𝑶𝑼 𝑨𝑺 𝑨 𝑴𝑬𝑵𝑻𝑶𝑹
➡️ I help entrepreneurs in ideation, creation, establishment of their business, business model, and strategy.
➡️ I also help them in learning about the available technology solutions in the market, and evaluation and selection of the right ones for their business.
➡️ I also help young and ambitious managers and professionals to shape the future of their career.

𝑨𝑺𝑲 𝑴𝑬 𝑨𝑩𝑶𝑼𝑻
➡️ Business Build, Business Models, Business Automation, Digital Transformation, Leadership, Strategic Management, Business Management, Operational Excellence, Management Systems, Quality Management and also Professional Development.

𝑾𝑯𝑨𝑻 𝑰 𝑶𝑭𝑭𝑬𝑹
➡️ My Blog -> www.shahrammaralani.com/blog
➡️ My Book -> www.shahrammaralani.com/books
➡️ My Online Courses -> www.shahrammaralani.com/courses
➡️ Business Coaching for Entrepreneurs -> www.shahrammaralani.com

𝑮𝑬𝑻 𝑰𝑵 𝑻𝑶𝑼𝑪𝑯
➡️ s.maralani@outlook.com

treasury_media.title: The AI Shift: Redefining Knowledge Work in the Age of Generative AI: Transforming Expertise and Employment: Survival Guide for Professionals in the Artificial Intelligence Era
treasury_media.description: The AI Shift serves as an essential guide for professionals navigating the transformative age of Generative AI impacting their professions and businesses.

treasury_media.title: Build an Online Business In 24 Hours
treasury_media.description: Building an Online Business is a wonderful way to create a side hustle, which may eventually become your primary occupation. This book aims to inspire and provide you with a roadmap on how to build an online business from scratch or to bring your existing business online, in a short period of time.

treasury_media.title: Online Business Builders Club
treasury_media.description:
Online Business Builder Club is a community of entrepreneurs who are passionate about shaping online businesses enabling them to create Digitally Enabled passive income streams. Join this Exclusive & Restricted Membership Club here.
https://obb.club

contributors.headline: Senior Vice President & CDO at Nemko Group | Guest Lecturer at UvA | TICC Industry Expert | Business Strategist | Digital Transformation Leader | Business & Executive Mentor | Author | Public Speaker

projects.title: LinkSafe.io
projects.description: We have just completed the first MVP of "LinkSafe", a project we started together with one of my friends. LinkSafe is a browser independent bookmark manager with smart search functionality enabling you to reach to the websites and webpages you use for your private or work related matters in matter of seconds, instead of wondering for minutes or hours, where did you last saw what you are looking for. Over time, LinkSafe will grow adding various functionalities. Please try this early release and give us feedback. We will be happy learning about your experience of using the tool, and also about any bugs and needed improvement you may come across.

profile_positions.title: Global Director Of Technology & Quality

profile_positions.description:
Regional Director, Business Assurance Central Europe
Responsible for our business in DNV GL Business Assurance in Central Europe including BeNeLux, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Poland and East European countries where we deliver management system, product and personnel certification, assessment, training and other services. Leading the region in different aspects of the business, ranging from profit and loss, target setting, budgeting, leadership development, human capital management, employer value proposition, to sales and marketing, operations, customer service management, efficiency and continual improvement. I exercised my role through my team of senior leaders responsible for different parts of the organization in the region, functionally as well as geographically. Part of the Executive Leadership Team of our Business Assurance division reporting to the CEO.
